blockparts.description: Used in customizing Component Blocks. Outputs the input field with the contents specified by the attribute.

attributes.label: Specifies label for input field (For radio button/checkbox, specify the radio button/checkbox label)
attributes.single: Specify 1 when there is only one field in the block
attributes.value: Specifies the value attribute value of a radio button or checkbox
attributes.asset_class: Specifies the type of asset to select when the edit type is assets
attributes.relation_model: Specify the model you want to select when the edit type is relation
attributes.single_choice: Specify 1 if you want to single-select objects when the edit type is asset or relation
attributes.rows: Specifies the rows attribute value of the textarea
attributes.v-on:*: Specifies the v-on attribute value of the Vue.js
